More like:

"During the early 2010's. Society suddenly experienced a major setback in their intelligence. Many studies affirm that the main cause seemed to be political correctness about justice towards society, with their major activists being from the teenage demographic yet their objectives tended to always be aimed at something diametrically opposite, which is also attributed to the still early exposure of these younglings to the internet."

Moral of the story kids, mankind was too dumb to use the internet properly
